Unsho Ishizuka

Unsho Ishizuka

Unsho Ishizuka, born as Yukinori Ishizuka, was a Japanese voice actor, narrator and actor affiliated with Aoni Production.

  • Known For
    Acting
  • Born
    16 May 1951
  • Place of Birth
    Katsuyama, Fukui Prefecture, Japan
  • Died
    17 August 2018 (aged 67)
